item.title: Help Please [317]
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

Hello, I was wondering is there a way to make a item require a special rank like Administrator to be able to wield this item? also if any one knows where to get a blank/clean 317client with 377 cache that has the correct models for the fences please post a link I have, looked/searched for days.

would something like this work?
if so what do i put in the allow and deny slots
and where would i insert this Code

if (ItemID = #### ) && playerRights == #) {
       // Allow Equipt
} else {
      // Deny Equipt
}

also upon this is there a way to make a Client keep track of last 5 servers it connected to.

Thanks,
-FusionLord

Read full topic
